calculator

Class CalculatorViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • calculator.CalculatorViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CalculatorViewController
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class is to assign text filed, label, and buttons on the panels. Also it is to control the features with the action listener
    Since:
    1.8.0_181
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Seongyeop Jeong
    See Also:
    CalculatorViewController, Serialized Form

      This class is to set up the keybord input with calculator

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(boolean enableDefault)

      • createButton

        private javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text,
                                         java.lang.String ac,
                                         java.awt.Color fg,
                                         java.awt.Color bg,
                                         java.awt.event.ActionListener handler)
        This method is to create button by using JButton function, then it is including the 4 parameters which are strings, colors, and action listener
        Parameters:
        text - it is text to show the letters on the label and button
        ac - to display texts which is connected to the user input with the button
        fg - foreground color
        bg - background color
        handler - this is the reference of the event handler class
        Returns:
        button return the created button to calling function
